channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The silent, subtle mistakes that take executives out of the CEO race
item.description: In a CEO search, small moments can end a candidacy instantly.

item.title: America’s $38 trillion national debt ‘exacerbates generational imbalances’ with Gen Z and Millennials paying the price, warns think tank
item.description: "Without significant policy changes to reduce debt growth, future generations will inherit a budget where significant resources are locked into servic...

item.title: Technological shifts are breeding a new type of CEO: Meet 25 rising execs inside the Fortune 500
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Global selloff in stocks signals AI bubble may be ending in the healthiest way possible
item.description: Investors are selling off individual stocks of companies that seem to be overextended, but they are broadly bullish on stocks as a whole.

item.title: Trump sues BBC for $10 billion over January 6 video editing
item.description: The broadcaster had apologized last month to Trump over the edit of the speech. But the publicly funded broadcaster rejected claims it had defamed him...

item.title: South Korean battery stocks slump on Ford's EV decision
